name: Roo´s Run
description:
Roo is a little raven whose hobbie is to snitch into the local abandoned castle to have demential runs, avoiding death and collecting... his own spiritts?

Use the spacebar to jump, avoid the spikeballs, and collect the gosths.

This is an endless runner designed for prectice. 

You can check the proyect on GitHub:

https://github.com/UnityCarbonell/Roo-s_Run_Game
